name: waterHeatingTemperature_decrease
description: This function is used to decrease the hot water temperature of the boiler.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to decrease the hot water temperature.

parameters.name: waterHeatingTemperatureDelta
parameters.description: The amount by which to decrease the hot water temperature.
